事.definition: matter; thing; item; work; affair; CL:件[jian4],樁|桩[zhuang1],回[hui2]

事不宜遲.definition: the matter should not be delayed; there's no time to lose

事不過三.definition: (idiom) a thing should not be attempted more than three times; don't repeat the same mistake again and again; (idiom) bad things don't happen more than three times

事不關己.definition: a matter of no concern to oneself (idiom)

事不關己，高高掛起.pinyin: shì bù guān jǐ ， gāo gāo guà qǐ
事不關己，高高掛起.definition: to feel unconcerned and let matters rest (idiom)

事主.definition: victim (of a criminal); party involved (in a dispute etc); main instigator

事件相關電位.pinyin: shì jiàn xiāng guān diàn wèi

事倍功半.definition: (idiom) to expend twice the effort for half the result

事假.definition: leave of absence for a personal matter

事先.definition: in advance; before the event; beforehand; prior

事先通知.definition: preliminary notification; to announce in advance

事兒.definition: one's employment; business; matter that needs to be settled; (northern dialect) (of a person) demanding; trying; troublesome; erhua variant of 事[shi4]; CL:件[jian4],樁|桩[zhuang1]

事到今日.definition: under the circumstances; the matter having come to that point

事到如今.definition: as matters stand; things having reached this stage

事到臨頭.definition: when things come to a head (idiom)

事務.definition: (political, economic etc) affairs; work; transaction (as in a computer database)

事半功倍.definition: (idiom) to achieve twice the result with half the effort

事危累卵.definition: lit. the matter has become a pile of eggs (idiom); fig. at a critical juncture

事在人為.definition: the matter depends on the individual (idiom); it is a matter for your own effort; With effort, one can achieve anything.

事實上.definition: in fact; in reality; actually; as a matter of fact; de facto; ipso facto

事實勝於雄辯.pinyin: shì shí shèng yú xióng biàn

事工.definition: (Christianity) ministry (work of a spiritual or charitable nature)

事後.definition: after the event; in hindsight; in retrospect

事後聰明.definition: wise after the event (idiom); with hindsight, one should have predicted it

事後諸葛亮.definition: person who is wise after the event

事怕行家.definition: an expert always produces the best work (idiom)

事情.definition: affair; matter; thing; business; CL:件[jian4],樁|桩[zhuang1]

事業.definition: undertaking; project; activity; (charitable, political or revolutionary) cause; publicly funded institution, enterprise or foundation; career; occupation; CL:個|个[ge4]

事業單位.definition: public institution; (Tw) business enterprise; company; firm

事業心.definition: devotion to one's work; professional ambition

事業有成.definition: to be successful in business; professional success

事業線.definition: (palmistry) fate line; career prospects line (running vertically up the palm to the base of the middle finger); (slang) cleavage

事機.definition: confidential aspects of a matter; secrets; key moment for action

事無大小.definition: see 事無巨細|事无巨细[shi4 wu2 ju4 xi4]

事無巨細.definition: lit. things are not separated according to their size (idiom); fig. to deal with any matter, regardless of its importance

事由.definition: main content; matter; work; origin of an incident; cause; purpose; subject (of business letter)

事與願違.definition: things turn out contrary to the way one wishes (idiom)

事跡.definition: deed; past achievement; important event of the past

事過境遷.definition: The issue is in the past, and the situation has changed (idiom).; It is water under the bridge.

事關.definition: to concern; on (some topic); about; concerning; to have importance for

事關重大.definition: the implications are profound; the ramifications are huge; (of a decision etc) consequential
